description:
Jason and his legendary battle vechicle, SOPHIA, are back again to save the world!

A scientific organization has created a life-form whose base structure was a tissue sample from a former foe Jason was supposed to have destroyed. The life-form has grown beyond their control and intends to wage war on all humans. Using the strong weapons and high jump power of SOPHIA, Jason must head to the subterranean region where the life-form resides and eliminate everything in his path. In narrow places, Jason must exit SOPHIA and move through catacombs on foot. In the catacombs, you control Jason in the top-down view, and battle with guns and grenades.
name: Blaster Master Enemy Below
disclaimer: You may need an additional compatible SD card or SDHC card with available space to download this software. Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
